name: Beautiful Lies
description:
DISCLAIMER: 95% of things you see in the game are placeholders and subject to change

Beautiful Lies is a concept we're trying to unfold to teach people about social anxiety, the causes and effects to the individuals who suffer. You play as Linda (generic name for now) who suffers from severe anxiety and black outs. We're trying to understand how the black outs affect an individual and what goes through their mind.

We've conducted multiple interviews and looked into Phd research.

We made this game in 13 days, the concept had to be changed multiple times...

We will be updating this game weekly.

We'd appreciate your feedback.

KNOWN BUGS:

Graphics: Pixelation problems, sprite sheet bug causing character to have different frames appearing as they walk. High resolution background leading to character having low resolution.

Some text might appear outside of the speech bubbles.

If text is going to fast please let us 

Suggestions are extremely welcome.
